subject: Improve UI clarity: standardize terminology and modernize labels
body:
This commit improves the user experience by standardizing terminology
and making the interface more intuitive for users.

Key changes:
- Unified perspective names: "Your Company", "Client", "Combined View"
- Renamed tabs: "Charts" (was Visualizations), "What-If" (was Sensitivity)
- Changed "Direct" mode to "Manual" and "Explore" to "Select Model"
- Modernized Section 11(e) labels to "Standard Software (2-year write-off)"
  and "Complex Systems (5-year write-off)" with clearer help text
- Updated keyboard shortcut from S to C for Combined View
- Made transfer pricing warning jurisdiction-agnostic
- Updated input categories to "Your Company Costs" and "Client Treatment"
- Updated all documentation to reflect changes
